name: mussily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an untidy way: Her hair was mussily pulled back from her face. He folded the letter mussily, and shoved it into his pocket.
More examplesFewer examplesHer hair was tousled mussily around her face. He anxiously ran a hand through his hair so that it stood up mussily on his head.She wrapped the present quickly and mussily.He was dressed mussily in wrinkled old work clothes.Her sari was mussily creased from the journey.
